org.apache.openjpa.persistence
Interface StoreCache

All Superinterfaces:
Cache
All Known Implementing Classes:
StoreCacheImpl
public interface StoreCache
extends Cache

Represents the L2 cache over the data store.

Since:
0.4.1
Author:
Abe White

getDelegate
